\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 98823}

\subsection*{Heavy as a Boulder}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{8x7}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 800 mg & rectal & Pharms - Metaxalone & pill / tablet\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 5 mg & rectal & Melatonin & pill / tablet\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & .5 mg & rectal & Pharms - Alprazolam & pill / tablet\\
\hline
 T+ 0:20 & .5 mg & sublingual & Pharms - Alprazolam & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 200.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Took 800mg skelaxin (metaxalone), 5mg melatonin and .5mg alprazolam rectally all at once, followed by .5mg alprazolam 20 minutes later sublingually. 



I'm frozen like a rock and can't think at all. First time doing a benzo, don't feel anything whatsoever. I've done opiates, stims etc and this feeling is completely different. Seems like my body is frozen and my mind is on a dull autopilot.

\end{document}
